ingredients.ingredient: 6 large Hass avocados, pitted and peeled
2 tablespoons finely chopped jalapeno chile pepper

cookingTips: Use fully ripe but still firm avocados; if too soft they'll turn brown quickly
Mash avocado to desired consistency—chunky or smooth based on preference
Add lime juice immediately to prevent browning and add brightness to flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This guacamole mimics a popular fast-casual style with simple, fresh ingredients. Do you prefer chunky or smooth guacamole, and will you serve it immediately?
